articles.title: US thwarted plot to kill Sikh separatist in America - Reuters
articles.description: United States authorities thwarted a plot to kill a Sikh separatist in the United States and issued a warning to India over concerns the government in New Delhi was involved, a senior Biden administration official said.
articles.content: NANTUCKET, Mass./NEW DELHI, Nov 22 (Reuters) - United States authorities thwarted a plot to kill a Sikh separatist in the United States and issued a warning to India over concerns the government in N… [+5476 chars]
